SEARCH
Package Models

Class Map

java.lang.Object
Models.Map
public class Map extends Object
This class manages all the edit operations for the maps and validates the maps.

      This method handles the add continent operation on the map.
      Parameters:
      p_continentName - name of the continent that is to be added
      p_bonus - Control value for the new continent [Armies the player gets on acquiring the whole continent]

      InvalidMap - exception

    • isContinentConnected

      public boolean isContinentConnected(Continent p_continent) throws InvalidMap
      This method checks whether the continent is connected or not. [Directed connected subgraph ]
      Parameters:
      p_continent - Continent object
      Returns:
      True or false. Whether the continent is connected subgraph or not.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - exception

    • dfs

      public void dfs(Country p_country, HashMap<Country,Boolean> l_visitedCountryMap, Continent p_continent)
      Applies the DFS for the countries in the continent.
      Parameters:
      p_country - Current country from where DFS is to applied
      l_visitedCountryMap - Hash map to track whether the country is visited or not.
      p_continent - Continent name
